short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to replace a default label color given by Google, replace it with pre curated color palettes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Label Color Customizer for Google Calendar

Extension to replace a default label color given by Google, replace it with pre curated color palettes

version 2.1 - add new colors
version 2.0 - support unconfirmed event and add new color
version 1.1 - add change color on label dialog
version 1.0 - first release label customizer
